channel.title: delivery on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in delivery on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-25
item.description: Airbnb says it plans to temporarily house 20,000 Afghan refugees (2 minute read) Airbnb will house 20,000 Afghan refugees around the world in the properties listed on its platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-26
item.description: Samsung’s new partnership offers another glimpse of a drone delivery future — in only one Irish town (2 minute read) Samsung has partnered with Irish drone delivery company Manna to bring drone delivery of small electronics like phones and smartwatches to a small town in Ireland.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-03
item.description: Amazon will have a new CEO as Jeff Bezos transitions to executive chair later this year (2 minute read) Jeff Bezos will step down as CEO and become the executive chair of the Amazon board in Q3 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-06
item.description: OpenAI’s DALL-E creates plausible images of literally anything you ask it to (5 minute read) OpenAI’s DALL-E is an AI that can generate images based on text descriptions.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-18
item.description: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members (6 minute read) Amazon Pharmacy has launched in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-01
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Air can officially begin drone delivery trials in the US (2 minute read) Amazon has officially become an air carrier, with the Federal Aviation Administration granting Amazon Prime Air approval to begin its first commercial delivery trials in the US.
